channel.title: Stopping a person from ::pickup a certain item id
channel.description: hey everyone. I have a question about something that i want to make so that a person cant use the ::pickup code for every id. I want it to block out certain ones like 00773 for example. Can anyone explain how to do this? Btw i am using a 317 server. thanks!

item.title: Stopping a person from ::pickup a certain item id
item.dc:creator: @baseball4355 baseball4355
item.description:
@baseball4355 wrote:

where would i put the id for the item though?

Read full topic
item.source: Stopping a person from ::pickup a certain item id

item.title: Stopping a person from ::pickup a certain item id
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

Can you post how your command goes? Like if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" ");
or something like that so I can get a better look.

Read full topic
